backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor handling inquiries with submit, list, confirm, delete operations and admin authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a task to replace the site header logo asset while preserving the existing path.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend source files for reference in build planning.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles and custom theme variables defining light and dark color systems and global typography.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file setting metadata, favicon, Open Graph tags, and mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router setup defining all application routes and layout with lazy-loaded gallery support.
frontend/src/components/seo/Seo.tsx: React component that dynamically updates page title and meta description/OG tags.
frontend/src/components/site/FloatingCon: Floating WhatsApp and phone call action buttons using business contact info.
frontend/src/components/site/GalleryLigh: Modal lightbox for viewing gallery images with keyboard navigation and previous/next controls.
frontend/src/components/site/InquiryForm: A form component that collects inquiry details, submits them via a custom hook, and shows success or error alerts with an option to continue on WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/site/ServiceCard: Displays a service’s icon, name, and description inside a styled card.
Renders the website footer with about text, social links, quick links, and contact info.
Provides the site header with logo, navigation links, and a mobile menu using a sheet drawer.
Wraps pages with a consistent layout including header, footer, and floating contact actions.
frontend/src/components/site/SubmissionA: Shows a styled success or error alert with appropriate icons and messaging.
frontend/src/components/site/Testimonial: Displays a testimonial with star rating, text, and author details.
frontend/src/content/businessInfo.ts: Exports core business contact details, WhatsApp info, and location map embed URL.
frontend/src/content/galleryItems.ts: Provides a list of gallery images and video placeholders with paths and alt text.
frontend/src/content/services.ts: Defines the list of services with names, descriptions, and associated icons.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Contains structured copy for home, about, and coming-soon sections of the website.
frontend/src/content/socialLinks.ts: Exports social media profile links for Facebook, Instagram, and YouTube.
frontend/src/content/testimonials.ts: Provides an array of testimonial entries with names, events, text, and ratings.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the current identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitInquiry.ts: Defines a mutation to submit an inquiry through the actor and invalidates the inquiries query on success.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark theme CSS variables for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider and mounts it to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with SEO, story, mission, values, and expertise sections using site content.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Displays contact information, an inquiry form, and related UI with SEO metadata.
frontend/src/pages/GalleryPage.tsx: Shows a gallery of images with a lightbox and includes SEO and a visual grid of gallery items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with a hero banner, intro content, service highlights, and CTA buttons using site copy and images.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Displays a hero header and a grid of service cards plus a CTA for custom quotes using data from the services list.
frontend/src/pages/SetupLaunchPage.tsx: Shows a step‑by‑step setup and launch guide with cards explaining domain, hosting, HTTPS, and search configuration.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Renders a testimonials hero section and a grid of testimonial cards sourced from the testimonials data.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read, persist, and clear URL parameters using URLSearchParams and sessionStorage.
frontend/src/utils/whatsapp.ts: Generates a WhatsApp message link by encoding inquiry data and using the configured business WhatsApp number.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, brand colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, requirements, architecture notes, and feature tracking for the website build.
